when(Steps) - Static method in class bddtester.api.BddSuite
Creates a Steps instance and adds every Step of the parameter to it.
when(String, Runnable) - Static method in class bddtester.api.BddSuite
Describes a single Step and returns it as Steps.
when(Steps) - Method in class bddtester.core.bdd.scenario.OutlineDescriptor

when(TypeSteps<T>) - Method in class bddtester.core.bdd.scenario.OutlineDescriptor
Adds all steps of the specified scenario to the steps.
Note, that the generic type of the parameter has to fit the generic type of this class.

The GherkinKeyword of the step is "When".
